replies.body:
Them Dom acting skillz. lul

This was actually really good. Cinematography was more than I expected. Acting was definitely the best I've seen in a short film for a while. I would watch a full length feature of this. :) Nicely done Mickey and team. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Dom: "Try not to feed." What a troll...
This was amazing {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
This was super beautiful. Thank you for sharing this, its really special. Seriously looking forward to more.** I'd pay to see this become a full length feature film. **
Hi everyone, Swagglehaus here, the director :). Thanks for all the positive feedback! Hope you all enjoy! Happy to answer any questions you guys may have.
Is there more coming? Along this story line, I know it said above there would be more in general
The film had great cinematography especially considering the subject-matter. Also, I love the well placed dialogue of the teacher while Alex is in the classroom. That's a powerful quote.
This film is Godlike{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

music was kinda depressing, got me in a sad mood, but it matched perfectly with the theme of the film, and i was actually excited to see the PC Bang so i could try to figure out where it was to visit myself. XP

opportunities to meet actual pro teams as closely as depicted don't happen too often i think.

Thanks for watching. We were going for that somber tone overall.

The PC Bang we filmed at is actually in Arcadia and is called DreamLab Gaming
The PC Bang is in Koreatown, Los Angeles on Vermont and 4th Street. 401 S Vermont Ave Los Angeles CA 90020 I PC Bang.
I think the Fiora in the beginning was me tbh
Part 2...I need it...now.
I got so many chills and i was so sad when it ended. Amazing short film please make more.

So many players in this community do not realize how important this game is to some people. To some it is just a game, but to others it is a passion that people are willing to try their damnedest to achieve high goals and expectations. I am one of the summoners that does enjoy this game and am tired of the toxic players and players with the negative attitudes that can make the game a bad experience for players like me. I have been a consistent player of league of legends for the past 6 years and I will play league for the rest of my life. I would have been so honored to have an experience like this happen to me. League Of Legends is my passion and I continue to try my best even through the negative experience. My updated name is Dark Lunacy and I am a serious dedicated league player. If you want a serious player that loves the game and community look me up and test me for a team that wants to go professional. I am willing to take a chance to prove myself. Thank you for taking the time to read this and I wish all good luck and best wishes in your Matches. Fare well! :)

Dude im sorry but you are bronze. You are ranked like 1 million something out of all of the league players. Sorry to say it but until you are challenger not a single team will have a thought about recruiting you. If you really want to join a professional team, stop beggin people on a forum, and get challenger. Until then, you will not be a professional player.
BOI. He literally just said that he isn't amazing but he's passionate, and he also said that he is sick of negative people and stuff. So like really, why you gotta be such a debby downer.

I always try to be positive, ALWAYS, and I agree with this, I'm silver 5 and because of all the troll and the negative player, tilted one, toxic one, salty one and everything that could exist, I get tilted at the end and all I want is to end, I can't climb up without a good team to help me climb, not because I need it, but because a team of 5 positive player Bronze is worth more than 5 challenger smurf in Bronze Negative and toxic asf because I am a carry, I always carried my team, I flamed them at the start but I stopped doing that, I will always help my team and hope I will get honored and also that I will be at least where I deserve to be, not Silver 5 but I think, low plat, most people think I deserve to be High plat, low plat, some few think I am Diamond so ... they all ask me if I am a smurf lol, well ... but sadly, I can't have good team mate in my elo, all I can do is give them tips to make them better, show them replay of my match so they know what to do, I found a Diamond Smurf mid main, I will probably ask him to teach me some things so I can be better at league and carry my team even more.
It would have been nice to have a full hour long movie but it was very good!!!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
I legitimately felt happy for him when he got that penta
This was incredibly well made.

I usually never tear up at anything, and yet this had my eyes burning. I think this guy did an amazing job on this, as I really connected with Alex as my own parents call gaming a waste of time. I might not be at the pro level, but gaming makes me happy and that's what they should care about most. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
i wish i could take pictures with TL {{item:3070}} {{champion:121}}
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}  NOOO its done :( i was enjoying it plzzz another!! :'(
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} very entertaining
Inspiring. Speechless. Great edit on the film. 10/10
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO I wanna watch more feelsbadman
This is how the legend FAKER was born.

I really enjoyed this video, and it did indeed resonate with me. My mom passed away 2 years ago, and the one of my only passions since that happened is my desire to work in the gaming industry (particularly Riot).

The short film was directed incredibly well. I enjoyed the story for the most part (Alex not realizing that pro teams existed was kind of surprising to me when he's that good. Also lol @ zed rocking hp/mana pots when he's playing w/ TL). Props to TL for making an appearance.

This video was incredibly inspirational. It speaks directly to the heart of our community, the gamers. 9.75/10.
The first 12 minutes was like the beginning of Spiderman
very good
Amazing...
alex gets penta "fucking scrubs" *under breath*
This was the an amazing short film.

Great work. 
We as viewers only get to see the final product that takes several years to achieve. Many people tend to forget the personal challenges and sacrifices  that professionals make in order to be the best in their field. Awesome addition in showing Alex's support system, and how his views were affected by those around him. Poh Poh loves you and may not always be right but she is doing the best with what shes got. 
Stay hyped Mickey!

This was ridiculously good. Cinematography was extremely well done and overall it was very emotional yet inspiring. A lot of the time I find myself watching back stories and vlogs of Pro Players from all teams and I find each and every single one inspiring. This short was everything I wanted it to be. Honestly, I hope this becomes a full length feature with the same character to develop the rest of the story with TL and where it goes from there. You should think about being the first to develop the first movie about Esports with your own unique plot like this one. Good luck in the future and can't wait to see what else you come up with. Cheers!!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
the boosted ape... if dom is still in tl, when was this film made?
Look not sugar coating anything, this is legit terrible. Chock full of stereotypes and tropes that aren't even delivered well by the actors. What the actual hell...
and your lowkey a dumbass

*you're




I don't usually correct people's typos, by the way--only when it's ironic.

this is exactly how i feel when i play video games and my parents tell em to stop because games do nothing for me i really want to be a successful twitch streamer but i am saving up for a PC that can stream games and i have saved for three years an i almost have 1000 i have 800 right now i am really looking forward to streaming and maybe even becoming a pro gamer this film is awesome
You have to give it to Riot and Blizzard... they know how to make a game look appealing.
Good film {{champion:103}}
I loved the Story. Please make more like this. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Pretty good for the most part. Kinda slacking in the plot line area. "Do what you love" plot? Even when grandma says NO!
ay
Fuck I wanted an actually movie about the rift and backstories like {{champion:92}} and {{champion:157}}. FeelsBadMan
I love asian Aubrey Plaza
this was awesome{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
